title: Carter And Cone Type Inc.
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204222402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204222402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Carter & Cone Type, Inc.**

Carter & Cone Type Inc., formed in 1991, combines the talents of [Matthew Carter](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204222402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Matthew%20Carter) and [Cherie Cone](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204222402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cherie%20Cone) to produce and market the designs of Matthew Carter. They license his typefaces to end users, and do custom work for corporations, newspapers, magazines, and university presses.

Carter & Cone have produced types on commission for Apple, Microsoft (the screen fonts [Verdana](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204222402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Verdana) and [Georgia](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204222402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Georgia)), Time, Newsweek, Wired, U.S. News & World Report, Sports Illustrated, The Washington Post, and the Walker Art Center.

[www.carterandcone.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204222402/http:/www.carterandcone.com/ "www.carterandcone.com")
author: James Grieshaber
